definitions: the process by which organic matter exposed to minerals over a long period is turned into a stony substance.
shortDefinitions: process by which organic matter exposed to minerals over long period is turned into stony substance

definitions: a state of extreme fear, making someone unable to move

examples.text: his heavy footfalls served to spur Paul out of his petrification

shortDefinitions: state of extreme fear, making someone unable to move

definitions: an organic object that has been turned to stone.
shortDefinitions: organic object that has been turned to stone
